title: Physics Body Concedes Mistakes in Study of Missile Defense
description: Two scientists said the American Physical Society had erred in evaluating their plan to use drones to shoot down North Korean long-range missiles.
dc:creator: William J. Broad
category: United States Defense and Military Forces
